Description:
LEGO Marvel Super Heroes continues the series have scored considerable popularity Games LEGO. 
At this time, the characters become legendary heroes of Marvel - gathered together their Nick 
Fury to counter the threat from vengeful Loki and Galactus, Devourer of Worlds. Story, written 
specifically for the game, packed with the trademark humor LEGO. 

In LEGO Marvel Super Heroes have access to more than a hundred characters, including such famous 
characters as Spider-Man, Iron Man, Wolverine, Captain America, Hulk, Thor, Black Widow, Hawkeye 
and Deadpool. A large number of unique skills, dynamic battles, epic battles, puzzles, unique history 
and corporate humor - all skillfully blended developers new LEGO game.
